title: Darkwing Duck
description: The beloved live-action superhero series canceled too soon. Darkwing Duck is the terror that flaps in the night. He is the little rollerskate at the base of villainy’s staircase.
altHero: Darkwing Duck spreads his cape atop a building against a full moon
alt2: Darkwing Duck dodges an electric bolt
alt3: Darkwing Duck grimaces as a banana doll levitates with glowing red eyes
alt4: Darkwing Duck emerges from a cloud of purple smoke
